name: Joseph P. Emery
biography: Maker of colors for ceramics.  Formerly located in Cobridge, England.  Purchased by the Tennant Group in the 1970s. During or after the 1970s, moved to Fenton, England.  In 2001 the Emerys and their sister co. Capper Ratoud were amalgamated as a single entity called Emery Colors Ltd. As of 2003, company still active.
